name: Blue Whale Flashlight, Fun Flashlight
description: This is the app can make your mobile phone become to an electronic torch which will brighten up your dark night. It achieves torch function through the flashlight of the phone. Please give access If the reminder of the phone is needing you to visit the camera .  Features:  --- Small and fast, open and close immediately --- Three modes: flash mode, screen mode, motion mode --- Applicable to all devices, with or without flash --- Support strobe, the flicker frequency can be adjusted randomly --- Simple and perfect interface design
